title: Design Document: Hazelcast Distributed Transactions

2. "- **HazelcastHealthIndicator**: Extended to includ...": remove，先不異動

comments.comment: 只能異動RestServiceDelegate，putServiceDelegate/getServiceDelegate都保留原本程式不去異動
comments.selectedText: - **putServiceDelegate/getServiceDelegate**: Serves as patterns for transactional service delegate implementation
- **HazelcastHealthIndicator**: Extended to include transaction manager health monitoring and active transaction metrics
